weddingVenues.name: Ancient Spanish Monastery
weddingVenues.capacity: Up to 150 in the chapel/cloisters; larger receptions up to 300 can be accommodated with outdoor tents.
weddingVenues.style: A 12th-century Spanish stone monastery with a castle-like, historic atmosphere in a lush garden.
weddingVenues.pricing: Base rental from $2,000 for a ceremony. Combined ceremony and reception packages range from ~$6,000-$13,000.
servicesAmenities: Main Chapel rental includes an organist and use of the pipe organ

images.alt: Ancient Spanish Monastery - Ancient Spanish Monastery - 12th-century Spanish stone monastery with castle-like architecture

weddingVenues.name: Hialeah Park Racing & Casino
weddingVenues.capacity: Multiple venues: Ballroom (450 banquet/500 reception), Clubhouse (600 banquet/1,000 reception), Turf Club (150 banquet/180 reception), Fountain Terrace (160 banquet/250 reception), Director's Room (50 reception), Paddock (large festivals/concerts).
weddingVenues.style: Historic 1920s racetrack with iconic Mediterranean architecture, famous flamingo lagoons, and multiple elegant indoor/outdoor venues including ballrooms, terraces, and open-air spaces.
weddingVenues.pricing: Wedding packages: Silver $95/guest (plated), Gold $125/guest (buffet), Platinum $155/guest (plated). Events phone: (786) 483-7460.
servicesAmenities: Multiple venue spaces (Ballroom, Clubhouse, Turf Club, Fountain Terrace, Director's Room, Paddock)

images.alt: Hialeah Park Racing & Casino - Boca Lago Country Club - Country club with banquet hall offering golf course views
